reasoning: High-volume file creation task following explicit instructions. All content is provided in the source document - no external research or integrations needed. Complexity is in volume (50+ files, 30+ directories) rather than technical difficulty.

scope.notes: Single repository setup with interconnected markdown files. ~30 directories and ~55 files to create including: CLAUDE.md, README.md, 7 agent persona files, 20+ knowledge-base files, output directories with gitkeep, logs, and review templates.

integrations.notes: No external APIs or services. This is pure content creation from provided specifications.

infrastructure.notes: Only folder structure creation. No Docker, databases, or environment configuration required.

knowledge.notes: Standard markdown file creation. All content is explicitly provided in FULL_AUTO_CLAUDE_PROMPT.md with exact structure and text to use.

concerns: Large number of files to create accurately
Content must be extracted correctly from source document
Cross-references between files should be consistent
risk.notes: Low risk since we're creating new files in an empty repository. No existing functionality to break. Main risk is accuracy of content extraction.

validation_recommendations.reasoning: Content creation task with no executable code, APIs, or security-sensitive operations. Validation should confirm all files were created with correct structure and content, but no automated testing is applicable.

major_components.name: Repository Structure
major_components.description: Create complete folder hierarchy as specified

major_components.name: Core Files
major_components.description: Create CLAUDE.md and README.md with full content

major_components.name: Agent Personas
major_components.description: Create 7 agent definition files in agents/ folder

major_components.name: Knowledge Base - Lore
major_components.description: Create core-world.md, character files, mechanics, timeline

major_components.name: Knowledge Base - Game Mechanics
major_components.description: Extract pre-registration spec into separate mechanic files

major_components.name: Knowledge Base - Crypto
major_components.description: Create SUI integration, tokenomics, web3 positioning files

major_components.name: Light Novels
major_components.description: Placeholder files for Volume 1 and Volume 2 (full text not in source)

major_components.name: Output Directories
major_components.description: Create output folder structure with .gitkeep files

major_components.name: Logs and Reviews
major_components.description: Initialize activity logs and review templates

notes.source_content_available: FULL_AUTO_CLAUDE_PROMPT.md contains all lore content, pre-registration spec, and file templates needed
notes.light_novel_limitation: Full text of Volume 1 and Volume 2 mentioned but not included in source document - placeholder files will be created
notes.execution_approach: Systematic creation starting with folder structure, then core files, then content files in logical order
